title: The Best of Don McLean (1999)
description:
Don McLean will always be remembered for writing "American Pie" and "Vincent", but there has always been more to him than those two songs. Those, and others like "Castles In The Air", "Wonderful Baby" and Crossroads" show just what a majestic songwriter he is, whilst at the same time other tracks, notably "Everyday" and Roy Orbison's "Crying" demonstrate that he interprets other people's material wonderfully. [Source: Amazon.co.uk]

Release Year: 1999
Genre: Folk-Rock
